title: Madiu Bari
text:
Madiu Bari (born 9 March 1998), is a Portuguese <a href="association%20football">football</a> player of <a href="Guinea-Bissau">Bissau-Guinean</a> descent. He plays for <a href="Rio%20Ave%20F.C.">Rio Ave B</a>.
Club career.
Lazio.
He started playing for <a href="S.S.%20Lazio%20Youth%20Sector">Lazio's Under-19 squad</a> in the 2016–17 season. He has never been called up for the senior squad, and parted ways with the team at the start of 2021.
Loan to Dornbirn.
On 2 September 2019 he joined Austrian club <a href="FC%20Dornbirn%201913">Dornbirn</a> on a season-long loan.
He made his professional <a href="Austrian%20Football%20Second%20League">Austrian Football Second League</a> debut for Dornbirn on 21 September 2019 in a game against <a href="Floridsdorfer%20AC">Floridsdorfer</a>. He substituted Felix Gurschler in the 84th minute.
